ch.zhaw.psit.towerhopscotch.models.tower

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.zhaw.psit.towerhopscotch.models.tower.Tower
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleTower, MonoTower, TripleTower

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    The class represents the tower on the map and is the superclass for the different towers The tower can be upgraded and rendered
    Author:
    Raphael Emberger, Stefan BÃ¶sch
